name: minicraft
description:
This game is for everyone that likes pixel art and building games

You can play in 1 or 2 players (2 players with 2 gamepads only)

Wherever you go there will be resources that you can mine and then use to build in the world.

Simple game for the #lowrezjam with about 100 hours of work on it.

Please write me a mail for info or bug-reports at:

capitan_findus@hotmail.it

for the music thanks to these guys that put some really nice music royalty free, check out their channels!

Royalty Free Music:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxVD6oKZNBfIp5KfbtfscKA

God bless you all!
